WorkItem.ClosedComment: I'm not exactly sure what was causing this one, but a little tweaking and it appears to be fixed now
WorkItem.Description:
I've not been able to get the Oct 28 release to run properly.  
 
Opening a saved state file, or using Restore Previous State option, the calculator resets and clears memory each time the program is launched and each time a saved state is opened.
 
This happens for the 32 and 64 bit versions on various computers.
WorkItem.Summary: calc memory cleared each time program is run
